OmniIntegrationProcedure.description: This IP extracts Migration plan based on method type(Specific Offers and Any-to-Any)
OmniIntegrationProcedure.name: Migration Plan Extractor

omniProcessElements.name: MigrationPlanExtractor
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "bundle" : "ExtractMigrationPlanDetails", "chainOnStep" : false, "dataRaptor Input Parameters" : [ { "element" : "productId", "inputParam" : "productId" } ], "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "ignoreCache" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorExtractAction1", "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: MigrationPlansTransformer
omniProcessElements.propertySetConfig: { "actionMessage" : "", "additionalInput" : { }, "additionalOutput" : { }, "bundle" : "MigrationPlansConverger", "chainOnStep" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "executionConditionalFormula" : "ISNOTBLANK(%MigrationPlanExtractor:ataMigrationPlans:response%) OR ISNOTBLANK(%MigrationPlanExtractor:soMigrationPlans:response%)", "failOnStepError" : true, "failureConditionalFormula" : "", "failureResponse" : { }, "ignoreCache" : false, "label" : "DataRaptorTransformAction1", "responseJSONNode" : "", "responseJSONPath" : "", "returnOnlyAdditionalOutput" : false, "returnOnlyFailureResponse" : false, "sendJSONNode" : "", "sendJSONPath" : "MigrationPlanExtractor", "sendOnlyAdditionalInput" : false, "show" : null, "useFormulas" : true }

omniProcessElements.name: NoMigrationPlans

OmniIntegrationProcedure.propertySetConfig: { "additionalChainableResponse" : { }, "chainableActualTimeLimit" : null, "chainableCpuLimit" : 2000, "chainableDMLRowsLimit" : null, "chainableDMLStatementsLimit" : null, "chainableHeapSizeLimit" : null, "chainableQueriesLimit" : 50, "chainableQueryRowsLimit" : null, "chainableSoslQueriesLimit" : null, "columnsPropertyMap" : [ ], "description" : "", "includeAllActionsInResponse" : false, "labelPlural" : "", "labelSingular" : "", "linkToExternalObject" : "", "mockResponseMap" : { }, "nameColumn" : "", "queueableChainableCpuLimit" : 40000, "queueableChainableHeapSizeLimit" : 6, "queueableChainableQueriesLimit" : 120, "relationshipFieldsMap" : [ ], "rollbackOnError" : false, "trackingCustomData" : { }, "ttlMinutes" : 5 }
